t: How to sell books on e-commerce websites of big publishing companies like Penguin Random House & Harper Collins? How can I get their brand approval on Amazon - Quora
s: Answer: You are confusing publishing houses with book distributors. The big publishers will only market books by their own authors. You would have to have signed a book contract with them in order for their logo to appear on your books. Amazon is a book distributor and sells books from all kinds...
